rootCause: Whitespace-inside moustache placeholders in the docs and CLI recipes hid the sugarkube_cli helper and argument forwards, so the enforcement tests for docs-verify and start-here failed to detect the unified CLI wrappers.
resolution: Normalized the docs and workflow recipes to invoke the CLI as "{{sugarkube_cli}}" and tightened argument placeholders (e.g. {{start_here_args}}) so the guard tests recognize the wrappers again.
